summary.description:
A framework for closed-loop neurofeedback for real-time EEG decoding.

Framework for building a closed loop neurofeedback system.

Closed-Loop EEG Neurofeedback System.

The system requires images for the visual paradigm (see Stimuli). The recorded EEG data will be saved in the \ClosedLoop\subjectsData folder (see “Saving data”).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'neurofeedback', 'EEG', 'scalp', 'decoding'
summary.name: closed-loop
